abilities.name: Disrupting Spy
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Chatot G from your hand onto your Bench, you may look at the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. Put them back on top of your opponent's deck in any order.

attacks.name: Search and Escape
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Trainer card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Put Chatot G and all cards attached to it on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.
